description: On his cot, Casey Williams has been hogtied by Tommy Saxx and struggles to get free. He is about to succeed when Saxx stops him and reties him tightly in another position, then reinforces the rope with tape. Cameron Sage enters the scene, judges how well Saxx has tied Williams, and says it won’t take Williams 10 minutes to escape. Williams gets free, and then he and Sage tie up and tape-gag Saxx, with Saxx resisting every step of the way. Saxx’s feet are hoisted up, his camos are pulled off his ass and the two guys spank him. Sage caresses Williams as Williams jerks off over Saxx’s bound body.
title: L.A.B.D. Grey: Barracks 2-Theme and Variations on a Bunk Bed
